Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Ashburn in 1983...
Earned first career win on 4/6/1987...
Had first career hit on 6/11/1987, off Richard Emert (CC)...
Injured on 8/15/1987 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 6-7 weeks...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1987...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/1988, off Darryl Payne (PG)...
Injured on 5/28/1988 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1989, going 5-0, 0.76...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1989, winning 2 games with a 0.51 ERA...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1990, going 5-0, 0.44...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1990, winning 2 games with a 0.51 ERA...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1990, going 21-6, 2.59 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1991, going 5-0, 1.05...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1992, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
